amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 102 entitled "Waiver of Law Necessary for Improvement of Barriers at Border" from the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 109-4 to strike section 102 of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Farr amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 243 (Roll no. 29).
